snippet: A man shot his father in the head on Friday with a bow and arrow in front of a class at a Wyoming community college not long after fatally stabbing his father’s girlfriend at their home a couple of miles away.
abstract: Christopher Krumm of Vernon, Conn, kills his father James Krumm, an instructor at Casper College in Wyoming, in front of a classroom of students before then taking his own life; police say murder-suicide took place not long after Christopher Krumm had also fatally stabbed his father's girlfriend, Heidi Arnold, at their home nearby.
lead_paragraph: A man shot his father in the head on Friday with a bow and arrow in front of a class at a Wyoming community college not long after fatally stabbing his father’s girlfriend at their home a couple of miles away.
